Module kivakit.network.socket
Package com.telenav.kivakit.network.socket.server

Class ConnectionListener

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.network.socket.server.ConnectionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject
public class ConnectionListener extends BaseRepeater
Listens for client connections on a given port. Each new connection is passed to the socket Consumer passed to listen(Consumer) on an ExecutorService.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
